events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue reported has been identified as a refund request due to wrong item delivery.
Assigning customer support agent to handle the refund case for the wrong product delivery.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached a photo showing the wrong item I got instead of the shoes.
Thank you for the details. We will process your refund within 3-5 business days and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate you handling my refund so promptly.
We have completed processing your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method soon.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since you confirmed the refund was received successfully, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
